text: Today the Senate & House convened the first Energy&WaterDevelopment approps conference since '09. Delays by Senate Democrats to #ConfirmKavanaugh are baseless, as they currently have access to more material to evaluate him than for any previous nominee. In fact, @SenJudiciary received more pages of executive branch material than for the previous 5 SCOTUS justices combined. https://t.co/lF9o8BHs3c

Judge Kavanaugh has done an outstanding job in his hearings this week. The Senate must put aside unnecessary, partisan, political obstruction in an effort to move through regular order and #ConfirmKavanaugh.

Enjoyed being in #Mobile today for the dedication ceremony for the new federal courthouse for the Southern District of #Alabama! https://t.co/lP1l5zDAL9

The 1st FY19 #minibus conf. report has been filed, which contains Energy & Water Development, Military Construction & VA, & Legislative Branch funding bills. Proud we've come to an agreement on this package. I urge my colleagues to support it. Full text: https://t.co/pvEtcL8lza

Today on September 11th, we recognize the tremendous strength of our nation. We will always remember the courage of those we lost, as well as those who bravely risked their lives to save others. #NeverForget

Excellent news for #Montgomery! The city's Fire/Rescue Dept has been awarded $3.5M through @FEMA‚Äôs SAFER grants program. The funding will ensure the city has proper resources & staff to respond to emergency medical, fire, & rescue incidents. https://t.co/zzWQ4QNGsa

Judge Kavanaugh understands that it is Congress‚Äô job to make the laws, and it is the Supreme Court‚Äôs job to interpret these laws. He does not want to substitute his own judgment for that of Congress. Let‚Äôs bring his nomination to the Senate floor without delay! #ConfirmKavanaugh https://t.co/36QwvlzmQF
Honored to have received this award. Thank you @AIAspeaks! https://t.co/80vCOXAdvL

Proud of the Senate‚Äôs ongoing, bipartisan cooperation to pass appropriations bills. Tonight we voted to pass the final conference agreement on #HR5895, which packages Energy & Water Development, Military Construction & Veterans Affairs, & Legislative Branch bills.
I look forward to continuing to work with my colleagues to get more funding bills passed & to the President‚Äôs desk. https://t.co/OsdBQ4RzrU

Jody Singer is an excellent choice to lead @NASA_Marshall. Her understanding of the @NASA_SLS & other critical @NASA projects, along w/ her dedication to #MSFC & the entire agency make her the ideal candidate. Looking forward to working with her! https://t.co/Iqjsk8eIcN
This morning, @ULALaunch‚Äôs #DeltaII rocket successfully launched @NASA‚Äòs #ICESat2 mission to study ice around Earth. Congratulations to ULA on their 130th consecutive successful launch!
Happy Constitution Day! üá∫üá∏ Today marks the 231st anniversary of the adoption of the U.S. Constitution ‚Äì which was signed on September 17, 1787. #ConstitutionDay

Big win for @HudsonAlpha and the entire #Huntsville community. Proud that @NSF has awarded @HudsonAlpha‚Äôs Institute for Biotechnology $1.9M (of an intended total of $3.9M) to research how nitrogen affects plant growth and development.

A recent study found that 23% of filled pharmacy prescriptions resulted in patients paying too much. Proud the Senate voted tonight to pass @SenatorCollins‚Äôs bill to ban ‚Äúgag clauses‚Äù that prohibit pharmacists from sharing drug pricing info that could save consumers money. #S2554

Proud to have supported the #OpioidCrisisResponse Act. We have worked in a bicameral, bipartisan effort to fight our nation‚Äôs #opioidepidemic & present viable solutions for prevention. Looking forward to seeing this bill on @POTUS‚Äôs desk for his signature! https://t.co/n3FyBlXqs2
Happy 71st birthday to the @USAirforce! Today we recognize and honor all of the men & women who have served in the #AirForce. #AFBDay https://t.co/oj8SFPlab7

Passage of #HR6157 is the most significant step we have taken yet! The bill packages the Dept. of Defense & Labor-HHS-Education funding bills. This is a big deal for our country. Let‚Äôs keep working together to do our jobs for the American people. https://t.co/fS4rjTc3ln

For the 1st time in a decade, we are sending the #Defense spending bill to @POTUS‚Äôs desk on time! This legislation provides our nation with the opportunity to continue producing essential tools to support our men and women in uniform. https://t.co/z3CSpEiQ0n

Addressing our nation‚Äôs health & education needs is vital to the overall well-being of the American people. Passage of this bill is a critical step in achieving medical breakthroughs & groundbreaking research, while also prioritizing our education system. https://t.co/hO9f2HVRWI

The final Defense & Labor-HHS-Edu funding bills have been advanced by the Senate! In returning to regular order, we've worked together for the good of the process. Thank you to @SenateMajLdr, @SenSchumer, @SenatorLeahy & all of my other colleagues for their help. #appropriations https://t.co/aO35g8vl1R

#Huntsville Airport will receive $29 million AIP @USDOT grant for new taxiway, allowing increased accessibility & efficiency for air traffic commuting to/from N. Alabama. Will also play a vital role in enhancing economic development in the growing region! https://t.co/0uneKQrRSu
Excellent news! Testimony to the incredible work that @Austal_USA is doing in #Mobile. https://t.co/iT5Sx1ruqp

$4M is heading to communities in Alabama to help fight the opioid crisis! 15 community health centers across the state will receive @HHSgov grant funding to support increased treatment & prevention programs for opioid & substance abuse. https://t.co/0KdSiOHorS

.@POTUS has signed the 1st appropriations package into law, containing FY19 Energy&Water, MilCon-VA, & Legislative Branch bills! Package will help transition veterans to new health care program and provides funds for nuclear security & US Capitol safety. https://t.co/WnfkthFeE9

.@USNISTgov awarded $3.2M to @TroyUNews to build a new facility for researching recycled plastic materials. The center will serve as an avenue for groundbreaking research & will promote development throughout Troy by training the workforce of the future! https://t.co/QHrpCSvmT5

Great sitting down with the Boys & Girls Club of America this afternoon to discuss opportunities to promote the organization for youth in local communities. Also enjoyed meeting one of their board members, Denzel Washington! @BGCA_Clubs https://t.co/I7F0IvjJbD

Productive meeting with the Alabama Bankers Association! We had a great discussion about the positive impact of common sense regulatory relief and the current progress & economic development throughout the state. Appreciate them stopping by for a visit. @ALBankers https://t.co/m3FLRBJ99T

It was an honor to meet #Alabama‚Äôs 2018 Principal of the Year, Dr. Brian Clayton of James Clemens High School. Proud to hear about all of the work he is doing to promote academic excellence among our state‚Äôs youth! #PrincipaloftheYear https://t.co/2tCSEQqJjw

Great meeting with the University of Alabama System Interim Chancellor Fess St. John and @UofAlabama Athletic Director @Greg_Byrne today! I appreciate them stopping by for a visit, & for giving me a National Championship game football. #RollTide https://t.co/LD6iUzv8Gj

The House has passed the FY19 Defense/Labor-HHS-Education Appropriations bill, which includes a CR through Dec 7. Great news! Big deal for our country. Amazing what the Senate&House can do when we work together. Congress has now approved the most on-time approps bills in 22 yrs.

‚ÄúCongress is on the cusp of a funding victory that hasn‚Äôt been accomplished in a generation.‚Äù Proud of the significant progress we are making on #appropriations. This year marks the most funding bills approved on time by Congress since 1996. https://t.co/0yBFiLKrRk

Big announcement! @BlueOrigin & @ULALaunch will now be partnering to provide affordable, reliable access to space with an American-made rocket built in #Alabama. Looking forward to the groundbreaking of its new facility in Cummings Research Park. #MadeinAL https://t.co/yDC5lfubHt

Today @POTUS signed into law the Defense & Labor-HHS-Education #appropriations bills & CR thru Dec 7. This funds our entire military. 75% of the govt is now funded. Our progress benefits the entire country. Most on-time funding bills enacted in 22 yrs! https://t.co/U7LGdqSO2e

Enjoyed today's signing ceremony at the White House to fund our nation's #defense & keep the government open & running for the good of the American people. Thank you to my Senate & House colleagues as well as @POTUS for supporting efforts to restore this process. #Appropriations https://t.co/TBUitO0c2g

Today is @NASA‚Äôs 60th anniversary! In the past 6 decades, NASA has taught us about space & our planet, amazed us with great technical achievements, & demonstrated what we can accomplish when inspired. Congratulations to #NASA on this significant milestone. #NASA60

Today marks the first day of the new fiscal year. Proud we were able to work in a bicameral, bipartisan manner to pass #appropriations bills on time and through regular order ‚Äì keeping the government open and running for the benefit of the American people.

Productive @BankingGOP hearing today with @FederalReserve, @FDICgov, @USOCC, & @TheNCUA to discuss the implementation of regulatory relief efforts related to #S2155, which was signed into law. The results of this legislation will lead to a stronger economy for Americans. https://t.co/FZlUh7xxOR

The #FAAReauthorization Act of 2018 increases disaster assistance by providing $1.68 billion in supplemental appropriations in the wake of Hurricane Florence. More details on the legislation are available here: https://t.co/ECVYNqVd5Q https://t.co/EE8gc4mWuq
Thanks @AlfaFarmers! Enjoyed the visit with Jimmy. https://t.co/WuVbYzmIU4

Enjoyed meeting w/ @NIH Director Dr. Collins to discuss our nation's medical research needs. Proud that @POTUS signed the Labor-HHS-Edu #appropriations bill into law last week, which contains a $2B increase in NIH funding that can lead to future advances in healthcare & medicine. https://t.co/Gm928L6rqH

Major step forward for the entire aviation industry! The #FAAReauthorization Act prioritizes airport improvements, safety, & enhanced security methods. Proud to pass this bipartisan bill, further advancing our transportation & infrastructure capabilities. https://t.co/45F3sY72Ek

Proud that the Senate passed a bill today that provides $1.68 billion in supplemental appropriations for disaster relief in the wake of Hurricane Florence. The bill also reforms @FEMA programs to help communities better prepare for & respond to disasters of all types. https://t.co/ot6NcAwcL5

This week @Amazon broke ground on their new fulfillment center in #Bessemer, bringing 1500+ new jobs & a $325M investment. This marks the start of the biggest economic development project in the Birmingham area's recent history. Looking forward to the growth that will follow! https://t.co/nTkNryMn5m

Congratulations to my chief of staff, Katie Boyd Britt, on being named one of 2018‚Äôs Women Who Shape the State of #Alabama. I am proud of all of her hard work. She is very deserving of this honor. https://t.co/7X508fmgbB

This week, Education Secretary @BetsyDeVosED had the opportunity to visit #Alabama on her #RethinkSchool tour. Proud she was able to visit the RISE Center & @SheltonState in my hometown of #Tuscaloosa. Working with her to continue prioritizing our state‚Äôs education needs! https://t.co/bjHKjQUsDc

It's no surprise that our economy continues to thrive. This Congress, we've implemented policy changes that have increased wages, created jobs, & lowered unemployment rates. I'm determined to work with my colleagues to keep up this historic progress. https://t.co/t1HUiVwDHV

It was a pleasure talking with the Mountain Brook Junior High debate team! I was impressed by their intelligence, ambition, and skill, and I wish them luck in their debate at @Georgetown University this weekend. @mtnbrookjh https://t.co/6EmWTi7hlU

Today I voted to confirm Judge Brett Kavanaugh, who has been a principled, intelligent, & steadfast supporter of the rule of law. In accordance with my constitutional right to "advice and consent," I advise he be the next associate justice on the #SCOTUS. https://t.co/0bbuvweVi6

As #HurricaneMichael strengthens and heads toward #Alabama & other areas along the #GulfCoast, I want to encourage the utmost safety throughout the region. For the most up-to-date weather alerts, check @AlabamaEMA and: https://t.co/Enk6f0Qeap

If you're in the direct path of #HurricaneMichael, stay safe & take proper precautions. If you're in an area experiencing storm surge or high winds, stay indoors until you're notified by local officials that it is safe. Check here for @FEMA‚Äôs live updates: https://t.co/ZZUqm4DUlB

As you take precautions for #HurricaneMichael, please stay off the roads, beaches, & waterways. Use VHF Channel 16 or call 911 for emergency needs. You can also check in with the American Red Cross here: https://t.co/CMZhBuWnqy

The Senate today passed a comprehensive water infrastructure bill that will improve our community water systems & authorize impt programs that‚Äôll create jobs & spur economic growth. This legislation benefits all 50 states! Heading now to @POTUS's desk. https://t.co/2FtoyZODfN

Great news for #Alabama ‚Äì @ULALaunch has been selected by the @USAirForce as one of the top space launch companies in the LSA program. This means more funding for ULA to develop the #Vulcan rocket, which could eventually replace the Russian RD-180. https://t.co/4UYPmTP3ff

Thankful for first responders & those working to repair the damage of #HurricaneMichael. My thoughts and prayers go out to all of those affected in #Alabama & throughout the Southeast. https://t.co/kNAtp6Scxi

Proud to have confirmed Judge Liles Burke to be a District Judge for the Northern District of AL. He is extremely qualified for this high honor, having served as a judge in Alabama for over a decade. Congratulations to him on this prestigious achievement! https://t.co/5pFDsFWVDl

Relieved to hear that Pastor Andrew Brunson of North Carolina has finally been released after being detained in Turkey for 2 years. This is a huge win for the USA. I signed a letter to President Erdoƒüan in April advocating for his release. Great news!

This week is National Fire Prevention Week, which reminds us to have an emergency plan in place to protect our homes and our loved ones. Be sure to keep your family safe by checking out the #FEMA Home Safety Checklist. #FirePreventionWeek https://t.co/DLENpg5s4e

This Congress, our list of #accomplishments keeps growing! We have made significant progress for the American people by passing bills to improve the FAA & our nation's water infrastructure, provide for farmers, combat the opioid crisis, reform our tax code & more!

One huge #accomplishment achieved this Congress is the successful transformation of our nation‚Äôs courts. Nearly 1 out of every 6 circuit court judges have been appointed by President @realDonaldTrump & confirmed by the #GOP-led Senate.

This Congress, we've provided certainty to the American people with a restored regular order appropriations process, passing 9 of 12 approps bills thru the Senate & sending 5 to POTUS's desk ‚Äì enacting the most on-time funding bills in 22yrs & funding 75% of the govt on schedule.

Joined my #GulfCoast Senate colleagues in pressing @CommerceGov to properly implement U.S. antidumping laws in an effort to ensure our #catfish producers are competing on a level playing field. Read here: https://t.co/aWxqtoxt80

Under #GOP leadership, Congress reformed America‚Äôs tax code for the first time in 31 yrs ‚Äì delivering historic tax relief for families, workers, & job creators. The #TaxCutsandJobsAct is working to revitalize our economy & helping Americans keep more of their hard-earned money.

Thank you to University Charter School for this great video! Proud to have played a role in building an environment in West #Alabama that inspires students to learn & grow, building character & teaching responsibility. #UCSTrailblazers #RuralEducation https://t.co/OfymRKMmTG

Today members of my staff were able to join a tour of @ULAlaunch‚Äôs factory in #Decatur along with @NASA Administrator @JimBridenstine & #ULA CEO @ToryBruno, witnessing first-hand the technology & equipment used to build the most reliable rockets in the world. #AtlasV #VonBraun18 https://t.co/ZoBPXuS7we

Thank you to the excellent law enforcement authorities who brought the mail bomb suspect into custody. They did an outstanding job. Violence and domestic terrorism in all forms are not welcome in our country.

Saddened to hear about the horrible shooting in Pittsburgh‚Äôs Tree of Life Synagogue. We as a nation must strongly condemn acts of terrorism and hate in our communities and in places of worship, and stand together for unity and peace. My heart goes out to all of those affected.

Job openings in the U.S. are at a record high! For the 6th consecutive month, there are more job openings than there are unemployed Americans looking for work. We have successfully added over 4.2 million jobs since the 2016 election. #Jobs

Our hearts are heavy following the loss of Mike Adcock, a good friend and a true son of Alabama. Mike was beloved by all who worked with him and certainly by my staff and me. Please keep his family ‚Äì Cynthia, Avery, and Alley ‚Äì in your thoughts and prayers at this time. https://t.co/8dMyPMaOMc

.@MaxwellAFB is receiving $18M from the @USAirForce for a new Air Traffic Control Tower facility. Outstanding news for Montgomery & critical to maintaining & advancing performance at Maxwell, which serves as a training base for 90% of Air Force officers. https://t.co/S0jI5EHEMi

Congratulations to the U.S. @ArmyContracting Command on 10 years of successful operation. Proud of the great work taking place at the ACC & for the organization's dedication to defending our nation. Glad my staff was able to attend the celebration at @TeamRedstone today. https://t.co/pM3EGH6whD
Today's jobs report shows that the economy is continuing to grow under Republican-led policies and reforms. Wages are rising and unemployment remains at a 49-year low. https://t.co/GSetaCGb3w

Excellent news! This morning, @POTUS approved Alabama‚Äôs major disaster declaration request for the counties of Geneva, Henry, Houston, and Mobile ‚Äì allowing federal assistance for local recovery efforts following storm damage from Hurricane Michael. https://t.co/9toZMeq5lW

Thank you to my good friend, Jeff Sessions, for over 40 yrs of noble service to Alabama & our country. Jeff was a respected colleague of mine in the Senate for two decades & represented our nation with honor as US Attorney General. I wish him all the best in his future endeavors.

On Veterans Day, we honor the men and women who have fought to protect our country and defend our freedom. We are forever indebted to them for their brave service, courageous strength, and selfless sacrifice. Thank you today and every day. #VeteransDay https://t.co/VWBiXqpHNB

Great visit on Redstone Arsenal with the FBI. I received a briefing on the current construction on Redstone and also discussed future growth opportunities. A lot of good things happening in Alabama! Thanks for having me. #Redstone #Huntsville @TeamRedstone https://t.co/krmeIFh7cd

Today I voted for legislation that will preserve our national security & safeguard our readiness. This Coast Guard reauthorization bill ensures that the brave men & women who protect our ports & coasts every single day have access to the resources they need. Excellent news! @USCG

We had a good and productive meeting this afternoon with the President where we discussed funding the government and other year-end items. I am optimistic that we will be able to move forward when we get back after the break.
During my meeting with @POTUS, I brought up the need for disaster relief in the #Wiregrass following #HurricaneMichael. President Trump agreed to help.

Thank you @USDA for the $23M grant for #Uniontown to rehabilitate the city's wastewater collection system. Water & wastewater systems across the country are aging, overburdened, & in need of replacement. Proud to have led efforts for this project. @usdaRD https://t.co/reBjzd9NzL
Excellent news for North Alabama & for the entire state! Welcome to #Alabama @ToyotaPolicy & @MazdaUSA! #MadeinAlabama https://t.co/MFS82rHjsp
